title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not producing the expected output. The output is currently "MySomeAnn", but I expect it to be "MySomeClass". This issue is not yet implemented in the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: The current output is "MySomeAnn", but I expect the output to be "MySomeClass".
